channel.title: Lessons on James McAlonan
channel.description: Recent content in Lessons on James McAlonan

item.title: Virtual Machines For Ethical Hacking
item.description: This is my first online training course, aimed at those looking to get started with virtualisation, and Linux fundamentals. The course is designed to prepare you to take further courses in ethical hacking and penetration testing. What you’ll learn How to set up new virtual machines using VirtualBox. How to install Debian to a virtual machine. About the concept of the root user, and the sudo command. How to install VirtualBox Guest Additions.
